Package data_access

Class SqlDB

java.lang.Object
data_access.SqlDB
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataAccessor
public final class SqlDB
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataAccessor
The SqlDB class implements the DataAccessor interface to provide access to a SQL database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    SqlDB​(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String password)
    Constructor for SqlDB objects, establishes a connection to be used in communication with the database.

  • Constructor Details

    • SqlDB

      public SqlDB​(java.lang.String user, java.lang.String password) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Constructor for SqlDB objects, establishes a connection to be used in communication with the database.
      Parameters:
      user - Username to be used for validation and to determine the UserID.
      password - Password to be used for validation.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - Thrown if the connection fails or the credentials provided are invalid.

    • addCustomer

      public void addCustomer​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String address, java.lang.String postCode, java.lang.String phone, java.lang.String division)
      Inserts a new Customer record into the database.
      Specified by:
      addCustomer in interface DataAccessor
      Parameters:
      name - Name of customer.
      address - Customer's address.
      postCode - Customer's postcode.
      phone - Customer's phone number.
      division - The division (ie state or province) the customer is located in.

    • addAppointment

      public void addAppointment​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String location, java.lang.String type, java.time.ZonedDateTime start, java.time.ZonedDateTime end, int customerId, int contactId, int userId) throws java.lang.Exception
      Inserts an appointment record into the database.
      Specified by:
      addAppointment in interface DataAccessor
      Parameters:
      title - Title of the appointment.
      description - Description of the appointment.
      location - Location of the appointment.
      type - The type of appointment.
      start - The start time and date of the appointment.
      end - The end time and date of the appointment.
      customerId - Customer ID of the customer associated with this appointment.
      contactId - Contact ID of the contact for this appointment.
      userId - User ID associated with this appointment.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • updateAppointment

      Updates an existing appointment record in the database.
      Specified by:
      updateAppointment in interface DataAccessor
      Parameters:
      title - Title of the appointment.
      description - Description of the appointment.
      location - Location of the appointment.
      type - The type of appointment.
      start - The start time and date of the appointment.
      end - The end time and date of the appointment.
      customerId - Customer ID of the customer associated with this appointment.
      contactId - Contact ID of the contact for this appointment.
      userId - User ID associated with this appointment.
      appointmentId - Appointment ID of the appointment to update.
